full_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Dumbbells Set, 1kg Pair (2 x 0.5kg), Pink Hex Hand Weights with Vinyl Coating for a Comfortable Grip, Non-Toxic & Washable Weights for Home Gym Exercise for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_integration: Strategically embedded the highest-volume keywords ('dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights for women', 'hand weights for women', 'weights', 'gym weights') by weaving them into a natural product description. The title highlights key features (hexagonal shape, vinyl coating, non-toxic) and targets the primary use case (home gym) for both genders as indicated by the keyword data.
